meanings.definition: A book containing a list of code words or phrases.
meanings.sent1: I found the codebook with all the secret words.
meanings.sent2: She used the codebook to look up the meaning of the words.
meanings.sent3: The detective misplaced his codebook and couldn't crack the case.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a codebook, revealing her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The codebook was a treasure trove of hidden messages.

meanings.definition: A book used to decipher or encode secret messages.
meanings.sent1: The spy carried the codebook to decode the messages.
meanings.sent2: He wrote the message in the codebook to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The codebook whispered secrets to those who could read it.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a codebook, hiding her true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The codebook held the key to unlocking the mystery.

meanings.definition: A reference book used to interpret symbols or signals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist consulted the codebook to understand the signals.
meanings.sent2: They relied on the codebook to translate the symbols.
meanings.sent3: The codebook danced off the shelf, eager to help decode the symbols.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a codebook, unraveling the complexities of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The codebook illuminated the meaning behind the mysterious symbols.
